author: Raleigh, Sir, Walter, 1552?-1618.
publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Walter Burre[, and are to be sold at his Shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Crane,
notes: Printer's name, publisher's address, and actual date of publication from colophon.
This engraved title page also found in STC 20637-41.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
